channel.title: How to change HP food heals?
channel.description: I had this Idea...Well i first figured how to have unlimited food, all you do is ::setitem ANYITEMID 0385(shark) and you keep clicking on the shark and it keeps healing, so you have 1 shark, you eat it and its still there. But how woudl i change the HP values? Making it so it heals like 99?

item.title: How to change HP food heals?
item.dc:creator: @Slyte Slyte
item.description:
@Slyte wrote:

Ok whats your name on it :P[br][size=1]Posted at: August 10, 2006, 11:50:36 PM[/size][hr]When i try to join, it just goes to connection lost :([br][size=1]Posted at: August 10, 2006, 11:51:34 PM[/size][hr]YAY im in!

Read full topic

item.title: How to change HP food heals?
item.dc:creator: @Slyte Slyte
item.description:
@Slyte wrote:

I did this:

case 385: //Shark
healing[1] = 99;
healing[2] = 99;
healing[3] = -1;
break;

Yet when i eat a shark in game, i still only heal 20 =\

Read full topic
item.source: How to change HP food heals?

item.title: How to change HP food heals?
item.dc:creator: @cappy cappy
item.description:
@cappy wrote:

Im not sure what to do in hybrid, never used it.
But i did find this
HEALING
[0] = healing
[1] = MinHealth
[2] = MaxHealth
[3] = Items
[4] = UsedItem
*/
so thats what healing1, 2, and 3 would mean, id think anyway. Mess around with it for a minute, change healing[1] = 20 to something else, see if anything happens or you get a error, same with healing[2] = 20, sorry i dont know much about hybridscape.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change HP food heals?

item.title: How to change HP food heals?
item.dc:creator: @Slyte Slyte
item.description:
@Slyte wrote:

I’ll give it a try, also, if you are willignt o get on RS2 i’ll give a reward of…100k for helping?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 10, 2006, 10:48:09 PM[/size][hr]Whenever i edit anything of clienthandler.java, i start server and it always says the server is down, yet when i dont edit the file, i can login just fine, why is this :([br][size=1]Posted at: August 10, 2006, 10:52:22 PM[/size][hr]case 385: //Shark
healing[1] = 20;
healing[2] = 20;
healing[3] = -1;
break;

thats what i see, im using hybridscape though

Read full topic

item.title: How to change HP food heals?
item.dc:creator: @cappy cappy
item.description:
@cappy wrote:

im not 100% sure this is how, but open client.java, and search for
sendMessage(“You eat the shark, it heals 20 hitpoints.”);

above that you should see

heal = 20;
i think thats how, but if it doesnt change it, put it back to 20…

Read full topic
